FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, variable 2 to 4, becoming cyclonic 3 to 5 for a time. In northwest, southerly or southeasterly 3 to 5, increasing 6 or 7 later, occasionally gale 8 later in west.
Sea state
In southeast, moderate, becoming rough later in west. in northwest, moderate, becoming rough or very rough later in west.
Weather
Thundery rain later in west.
Visibility
Good, becoming moderate or poor later in west.
